title: Magnets!
description:
MAGNETS! is a local multiplayer, player vs. player, sumo game where you need to push all of your friends out of the ring (and maybe ruin some friendships along the way). 

But there's a twist! Every object, (YES! Even the sumo wrestlers) are magnets, so you'll attract or repel other players AND objects (like bullets and bombs) that get thrown your way!

The last magnet standing wins the round!

title: Ball-A-Site
description:
Grads in Games Rising Star 2023 Winner 

For the Rising Star competition, I was asked to create a game, starting from a giving project. I created a game in a week where you need to capture orbs that are wandering around a planet. The orbs get more difficult to catch in later levels. Every step of the creation of this game is documented on the link below.

title: Pengo_Clone
description:
This Pengo clone is a Win32 project, created fully from scratch. This game was created to showcase the capabilities of the game engine. 

The game engine contains:
* Component system
* Audio system on a seperate thread
* Event system
* Subject-Observer pattern
* Input system

 The game also supports up to two players.

title: Stochastic_Grammar
description:
Classes to construct stochastic grammar and create sequences following that grammar. It supports sequence rules, selection rules, repetition rules and recursion. 

These are generic classes, so the generated sequences can be an array of any type of object (from a string to an enemy). It contains functions to create grammar based on a given string.

title: Amba_The_Witch
description:
Amber recently graduated from the University of Witchcraft and today marks the opening day to her brand new potion shop! Can you help her to complete the orders for her customers?

But you better be careful, as mixing wrong ingredients can have unexpected outcomes.
